item.title: South Korean President Yoon detained after standoff over martial law decree
item.description: Yoon and his ruling party supporters remain defiant against the insurrection charges. He is South Korea's first sitting president to be detained.

item.title: U.S. watchdog sues Capital One, alleging bank cheated customers out of $2 billion
item.description: The CFPB claims Capital One intentionally kept news of its higher-yield savings accounts from members with lower-yield savings accounts.
